name: monolog/monolog
description: Sends your logs to files, sockets, inboxes, databases and various web services

suggest.graylog2/gelf-php: Allow sending log messages to a GrayLog2 server
suggest.doctrine/couchdb: Allow sending log messages to a CouchDB server
suggest.ruflin/elastica: Allow sending log messages to an Elastic Search server
suggest.elasticsearch/elasticsearch: Allow sending log messages to an Elasticsearch server via official client
suggest.php-amqplib/php-amqplib: Allow sending log messages to an AMQP server using php-amqplib
suggest.ext-amqp: Allow sending log messages to an AMQP server (1.0+ required)
suggest.ext-mongodb: Allow sending log messages to a MongoDB server (via driver)
suggest.mongodb/mongodb: Allow sending log messages to a MongoDB server (via library)
suggest.aws/aws-sdk-php: Allow sending log messages to AWS services like DynamoDB
suggest.rollbar/rollbar: Allow sending log messages to Rollbar
suggest.ext-mbstring: Allow to work properly with unicode symbols
suggest.ext-sockets: Allow sending log messages to a Syslog server (via UDP driver)
suggest.ext-curl: Required to send log messages using the IFTTTHandler, the LogglyHandler, the SendGridHandler, the SlackWebhookHandler or the TelegramBotHandler
suggest.ext-openssl: Required to send log messages using SSL
